executable.title: Compute Tube Fly Through Image (TubeTK)
executable.description: Computes a Fly Through Image for a Specified Tube in TRE File
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: inputTREFile
file.label: Input TRE File
file.description: Input TRE file containing the tubes

integer.name: inputTubeId
integer.label: Input Tube ID
integer.description: ID of the tube in the input TRE file for which the fly through image should be generated

image.name: outputImageFile
image.label: Output image
image.description: Output fly through image that will be generated

image.name: outputTubeMaskFile
image.label: Output Tube Mask
image.description: Output tube mask indicating the tube pixels in the generated fly through image
